data.message: There are rumors that FB will charge a monthly fee next month ?? Anyone ?

replies.message: Hey Aniello. Thanks for checking in with us. This campaign is a known hoax. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1saErKP.  -Elissa

Heard the same rumor as  if it happens and Facebook charges me a monthly fee, I will stop it all together! Otherwise, love it to keep in touch with  family members that I never met!!! At one time I hated it!!!

Thank you FB for not charging. I would not be able to stay on it and I would sure miss it. I have reunited with family and friends I haven't seen in years plus I have made so many awesome new friends. I am not in the best of health and this gives me a way of communicating and visiting I wouldn't be able to do otherwise.
@Aniello ...If they do charge a fee...I will b FaceBookless.  Lol. :)
This is a Farce. Thank you Elisa & Facebook for replying and continuing to keep a eye out and not ignoring concerns we have of this nature. ; )
